name: Alnory
description:
Welcome to Alnory, a broken land ready to be scavenged by your band of heroes! Take on quests for gold and jewelry in this turn-based strategy RPG -- growing your group as you see fit, and making it strong enough to face the ultimate evil. Alnory blends easy to learn tactical gameplay with strategic choices of growth in a world rich with fantasy and lore.

A fresh take on the casual SRPG -- using familiar elements in innovative ways, Alnory combines quick and colorful battles with deep character development. And a stunning soundtrack to boot!

Guide Ryall, Desra, Burth and Sheila on their journeys, watch them bond and squabble, make them rich and strong, and ultimately see them become legendary heroes of Alnory..

Currently available in Early Access for Windows, purchases made here will give you Alnory as it is being completed (right now 3 levels out of the planned 6), and the final Windows game once completed.

Looking for more info before purchasing ? Feel free to check out www.alnory.com, or the Wiki at alnory.wikia.com.
